analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#283-298):
	External calls:
	- core.setNewControllerAddress(newControllerAddr) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#287)
	- mntpTokenAmount = getMntpBalance() (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#289-292)
	- goldTokenAmount = getGoldBalance() (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#292)
	- mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#293-294)
	- goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#294-297)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isActualContractVer (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#298)

GoldmintPool.holdStake (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#214-226) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),mntpAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#220-221)

GoldmintPool.unholdStake (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#226-234) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#232-233)

GoldmintPool.distribShareProfit (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#234-246) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#237-239)
	-goldToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),goldReward) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#241-242)

GoldmintPool.withdrawUserReward (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#246-267) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#259-260)
	-goldToken.transfer(msg.sender,goldReward) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#262-264)

GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#283-298) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#293-294)
	-goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#294-297)

	- tokenBankAddress (/unique_chucks/43/0x907a62e39e860752b4196c780cf84f56c807cf60.sol#205)
